system_description: ScanlonSoft Retail Solution. A SaaS platform running in Azure that provides point of sale retail software to small businesses. React frontend, with APIs hosted in Azure App Service on the backend and an Azure SQL Database.
issue_summary: Customer experiencing intermittent slow responses in the admin dashboard.

conversation_history.message: Hi, my team has noticed that the admin dashboard is sometimes slow to load. It happens intermittently.
Thanks for letting us know, Sarah. Is this happening at specific times of the day or with certain actions?
It seems random. We’ve noticed it both in the morning and afternoon. No specific action triggers it.
Understood. We’ll start investigating to see if there’s any unusual activity or performance issues with the backend. I’ll keep you updated.
Okay, thank you. Let me know if you need anything else from my side.
Will do, Sarah. We’ll notify you once we have more information.
